Name: Wolf's Dragoons
Details: Considered by many to be the top elite mercenary group, Wolf's Dragoons arrived at the Inner Sphere in 3005 and have served all the Great Houses for periods of five years. They are currently at the service of House Kurita and deployed alongst its Davion border and consist of five full regiments plus support units, the Dragoons also include independent commands like the Black Widow Company, led by the infamous Natasha Kerensky.
